nodes.text: The Felucia theater, also known as the Felucian theater, was one of the six theaters of operations of the Outer Rim Sieges, which took place during the final stages of the Clone Wars.
The Felucia theater was located in the Mid Rim and the Outer Rim Territories. This field of operations was named after the key Separatist world of Felucia.

The Felucia theater was home to many of the Confederacy's key factory worlds, known together as the Foundry of the Confederacy. As the Confederacy sought to protect its industrial worlds, the Felucia theater saw some of the fiercest fighting of the Clone Wars. The campaign resulted in costly Republic victories at Jabiim, Saleucami, Felucia and Boz Pity.
